channel.title: Projects on My Personnal Blog - Noé Backert
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on My Personnal Blog - Noé Backert

item.title: TranFuzz: AI Fuzzing and Black-Box Adversarial Attack Evaluation
item.description: Study and evaluation of TranFuzz for generating black-box adversarial examples on image classification models.

item.title: Laser Fault Injection - Internship
item.description: Investigation and experimentation with laser fault injection techniques to analyze hardware vulnerabilities. Includes attack setups, power and pulse width parameters, and resulting BBICS behaviors.

item.title: Machine Learning Project
item.description: A machine learning project comparing deep learning models, including CNNs and MLPs, for image prediction using the CIFAR-3 dataset. Demonstrates training, evaluation, and performance analysis of various classifiers.

item.title: ASCON128 Digital System Design Project
item.description: Study and implementation of the Ascon128 lightweight authenticated encryption algorithm, focusing on its efficiency and security for resource-constrained environments and development using SystemVerilog.

item.title: Comif Mobile App
item.description: Development of COMIF, a mobile app designed for secure communication and remote management in a business assistance context, leveraging modern mobile technologies.

item.title: Multithreading Typing Game in C
item.description: Development of a multiplayer console typing game in C using sockets and threads. Focuses on managing multiple clients, time tracking, and score ranking in a client-server architecture.

item.title: Solidarity engineer project
item.description: Community-driven project aimed at reducing the digital divide for elderly learners through weekly digital literacy training sessions. Includes curriculum design, hands-on teaching, and certification events.

item.title: Predictive typing software in C
item.description: Implementation of a predictive typing program in C using hash tables and trie data structures to suggest next words in real time based on word frequency and user input.
